onNew

public void onNew()
Method called when user chooses "New" in menu or on toolbar. Asks user to save current document (if needed) and sets application to new document state

onExit

public void onExit()
Method called when user chooses "Exit" in menu or on toolbar. Asks user to save current document (if needed) and terminates application

onLoad

public void onLoad()
Method called when user chooses "Load" in menu or on toolbar. Asks user to save current document (if needed), shows dialog to choose file and loads document from it

onSave

public void onSave()
Method called when user chooses "Save" in menu or on toolbar. Shows dialog to choose/create file and saves document to it

onPreferences

public void onPreferences()
Method called when user chooses "Preferences" in menu or on toolbar. Shows dialog where user can set parameters

onAbout

public void onAbout()
Method called when user chooses "About" in menu or on toolbar. Loads text editor with FIT_8201_Sviridov_About.txt open

leftClick

public void leftClick(java.awt.Point point)
Method called when user clicks with left button on canvas and corresponding coordinate. Depending on current state either starts new polyline or continues current

Parameters:
point - coordinates of mouse click

rightClick

public void rightClick(java.awt.Point point)
Method called when user clicks with right button on canvas and corresponding coordinate. If current state is LidesFrame.EDIT_STATE ends current polyline, otherwise does nothing

Parameters:
point - coordinates of mouse click

main

public static void main(java.lang.String[] args)
Application main entry point

Parameters:
args - command line arguments (unused)
